A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have not seen any trailers\, I have had 0 expectations from the movie\, trying my best not to get too disappointed. 

I have became disappointed. Brilliant scenes\, soon ruined by... god knows what the writers/director were thinking. Much like the critics\, I have absolutely no idea how they give this movie a 93% rating.

It was short of a complete failure in my opinion. The movie\, which\, in essence\, is about nothing\, lacks that 'star wars' feeling to it. 

Again\, same mistakes as in The Force Awakens have been made; as well as many new ones.

On the bright side\, it made The Force Awakens seem bit better.
